title: 自从安了MoDLoader，它这样告诉我……
author: wolion1
txt_content:
Mods loaded: 1ModLoader 1.0.0      Minecraft has crashed!            ----------------------      Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 141ccf11 --------Generated 11-12-25 下午7:18Minecraft: Minecraft 1.0.0OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1Java: 1.6.0_29, Sun Microsystems Inc.VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.LWJGL: 2.4.2OpenGL: GeForce 6150SE nForce 430/PCI/SSE2/3DNOW! version 2.1.2, NVIDIA Corporation





求解…………………………

replies.author: doomtest
replies.txt_content: ModLoader表示他原本只是个路过的,谁知道膝盖上中了一箭!~

replies.author: Mr.Nima
replies.txt_content: 兄台 你用的是什么压缩软件？

replies.author: wolion1
replies.txt_content:
Mr.Nima 发表于 2011-12-25 20:06 
兄台 你用的是什么压缩软件？
经老师指点，换了好压…………
可是MOD一点作用都木有啊……
一点没变…………

replies.author: mayichong
replies.txt_content:
我帮你解决!
1. 去.minecraft文件夹, 之后进入bin, 删除minecraft.jar
2.重新force update(强制更新), 之后等一会, 你就发现.minecraft文件夹中的bin多出来一个minecraft.jar
3.之后把modloader放进去就行了!

replies.author: mayichong
replies.txt_content:
其实notch更新到1.0.0的时候吧一些mod都带过来了......
比如说我装1.8用的内置, 一升级到1.0.0, 直接crash(崩溃).....
如果我在1.0.0里装一个内置修改器, 强制更新, 内置还是有的......
